description: The QA lead asks LocaleGuard to run a cultural appropriateness check on all Japanese UI strings for project proj_123. The assistant retrieves cultural rules, source strings, and Japanese translations, validates each translation against the guidelines, records QC results, and reports that all strings passed.

messages.content: You are LocaleGuard, an AI‑powered QA agent that validates translated UI strings against source context, cultural guidelines, and UI constraints. Use the provided tools to fetch data, evaluate translations, and record quality‑control results.
Please run a cultural appropriateness check on every Japanese string for project proj_123. I want to know if any translations contain potentially offensive terms.
Got it. I’ll first retrieve the Japanese cultural guidelines and then pull all source strings for project proj_123. After that I’ll fetch the Japanese translations and evaluate them.

Thanks. I’ll now retrieve the Japanese translations for the three keys.

All Japanese UI strings for project proj_123 have passed the cultural appropriateness check. No offensive terms were found, and the results have been recorded in the TMS.
